QuestData.Title: The Shadowguard Incursion
QuestData.Description: As you have surely gathered by now, a certain subset of my people have tragically succumbed to the call of the Void.$b$bI had hoped to find more who possess the necessary strength of mind. I am disappointed to find such an utter lack of resistance.$b$bIt cannot be helped. To advance your cause, and mine, we will need to eradicate these weak-willed beings.
QuestData.CompletionText: Walking the razor's edge does have risks, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: It is good to know we can share a common goal. Perhaps I will find some use for your kind yet.
